div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

img.div:
Coronavirus Updates
Jean Reigel
Monday, March 16, 2020
img.p: UPDATE: The last day with students will be Tuesday, March 17. School will be closed beginning Wednesday, March 18 through Friday, April 3 due to the mandate of Governor Evers and the Wisconsin Department of Health.
If you wish to excuse your child from attendance March 17, due to underlying health concerns, please call the elementary or middle/high school office. Thank you.

p.a: Talking to Children About COVID-19 (Coronavirus) A Parent Resource
